creator: marc.grietens@eu.sony.com
text:
I'm running ./configure on linux s390
distro: SuSE 7.0
kernel: 2.2.16

---- ERROR LOG BELOW ----

configure: error: libtool configure failed

creator: thom@planetarytramp.net
text:
Hi,
it sounds like you need to get an updated config.sub and config.guess.
Probably SUSE have an updated package for them. (probably libtool).

This bug has already been reported, fixed, and will be included in the next
release of Apache.

Thanks for using Apache!

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 7818 ***
creator: jerenkrantz@apache.org
